analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nakusalaṁ namaggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: na kusalam na magga ārammaṇam dhammam paccayā kusalaḥ magga ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha pe avigate cha

original: Nakusalaṁ namaggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na kusalam na magga hetukam dhammam paccayā kusalaḥ magga hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nakusalaṁ namaggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: na kusalam na magga adhipatim dhammam paccayā kusalaḥ magga adhipati dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha pe avigate cha
